DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate long-term safety effectiveness Biocor Biocor Supra Valves .
DOC.brief_title: Aortic Mitral Valve Replacement With Biocor Biocor Supra
DOC.detailed_description: The clinical investigation multi-center , prospective , non-randomized , observational , FDA-required post-approval study design evaluate safety effectiveness Biocor Biocor Supra Valves .
DOC.criteria: Requires aortic mitral valve replacement ( heart surgery bypass allow time ) Legal age Signed informed consent prior surgery Willing complete followup requirement Pregnant nursing woman Already valve replace scheduled replacement Needs another valve replace Can return require followup visit Have active endocarditis Acute preoperative neurological event ( stroke ) Renal dialysis History substance abuse within one year prison inmate Participating another study Had Biocor Biocor Supra valve implant device explanted Life expectancy less five year
